name: Head Hunter (Mattburton64)
description: Head Hunter is a roguelike platformer where you slay enemies in procedurally generated environments. Exiting a level through a door progresses you to the next level where the generation is on a greater scale. Eliminate bosses to reap the power they possess. Combine combat-enhancing buffs with various weapon archetypes including close combat, archery, and magic items.  Level up as you kill enemies to increase your strength and earn rewards upon death. Die, and retry again with new starting perks and a fresh generation of levels to explore.
